title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Measuring and Analyzing Attitudes Toward Data Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts and general interest in data science
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners evaluate cognitive (knowledge understanding), affective (interest), and behavioral (participation) attitudes (5 items each, total 15) using the DSEAS (Data Science Education Attitude Scale) on a 5-point Likert scale, deriving quantitative results with an average ≥3.5 points.
Learners identify ≥3 strengths/weaknesses from survey data, analyze it using SPSS/R/Python, and write personalized feedback reports (1 page) for each learner.

Learners conduct pre- and post-surveys (5-point Likert scale, 10 items) to analyze attitude changes (e.g., ≥0.5-point increase) across educational methods (A/B/C) via t-tests or ANOVA, verifying statistical significance at p < 0.05.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
